thread.section_title: Hotel Therese - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great experience!
thread.title_full: Great experience! - Review of Hotel Therese, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JohnnyAmherst
title: Great experience!
text: Perfect location, great staff, good food, and lovely hotel. Was there for business but the address meant I could easily access amazing sights in between meetings. Hotel was very comfortable and the rooms, while small, were done well. I had a high room with views of picturesque rooftops. They have two sister hotels so be sure to ask for alternatives if they are booked. Grocery stores nearby with great quality foods and wines.
